title: Trading SGC 30 (Good 2) T205 Miller Huggins Sovereign Back
author: argpdt

posts.post_title: Trading SGC 30 (Good 2) T205 Miller Huggins Sovereign Back
posts.post_content:
Looking to trade an SGC 30 (Good 2) T205 Miller Huggins Sovereign Back for an equivalently valued card from the playing days of any of the following HOF players.

Johnny Evers, Eddie Plank, Rube Waddell, Elmer Flick, Harry Hooper, Ross Youngs or Addie Joss.

Note: I can't figure out how to get the uploads to show the photos upright, even though they are upright on my computer.
